Class ec.e.file.EDirectoryBase 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.file.EDirectoryEntry
           |
           +----ec.e.file.EDirectoryBase
public class EDirectoryBase
extends EDirectoryEntry
implements EFileInfo
Abstract base class for all sturdy directory objects.

asReadableDirectory()
Produce an EReadableDirectory representation of this same directory.
contents()
Produce a hashtable describing the contents of this directory.
isDirectory()
Test if this entry describes a directory (it does).
lastModified()
Determines the time that the directory represented by this object was last modified.
length()
Length in bytes of this directory file.

contents 
  public abstract ReadOnlyHashtable contents()
Produce a hashtable describing the contents of this directory.
Returns:
A ReadOnlyHashtable mapping names to objects representing the things in this directory. The exact nature of these objects depends on which subclass of EDirectoryBase is implementing contents().
asReadableDirectory 
  public abstract EReadableDirectory asReadableDirectory()
Produce an EReadableDirectory representation of this same directory.
length 
  public long length()
Length in bytes of this directory file.
lastModified 
  public long lastModified()
Determines the time that the directory represented by this object was last modified. As per the Java class library spec, the return value is system-dependent and should only be used to compare with other values returned by lastModified(). It should not be interpreted as an absolute time.
Returns:
the "time" the file specified by this object was last modified
isDirectory 
  public boolean isDirectory()
Test if this entry describes a directory (it does).
Returns:
true
Overrides:
isDirectory in class EDirectoryEntry
